presentation

Class Parser

  • java.lang.Object
    • presentation.Parser

  • public class Parser
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains the input text file and may parse commands from a given text file.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Stefan Ciuprina

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  Parser.Command
      The main types of commands that can be executed.
      private static class  Parser.CommandType
      The command types that could be assigned to the main commands.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.Scanner scanner
      Used to read from the text file.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Parser(java.lang.String filename)
      Creates a scanner or stops the execution of the program if the file doesn't exist.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private Parser.Command assignCommand(java.lang.String commandString, java.lang.String[] firstElements)
      Private method used by parseCommands method to get the command type.
      private Parser.CommandType assignCommandType(java.lang.String[] firstElements, Parser.Command command, java.lang.String commandString)
      Private method used by parseCommands method to assign the second command type in case of INSERT, DELETE or REPORT commands.
      void close()
      Closes the scanner.
      private boolean executeCommand(Parser.Command command, Parser.CommandType commandType, java.lang.String parameters)
      Executes the command given by the user.
      private boolean executeDelete(java.lang.String parameters, Parser.CommandType commandType)
      Deletes a client or a product in the database based on the commandType variable.
      private boolean executeInsert(java.lang.String parameters, Parser.CommandType commandType)
      Inserts a client or a product in the database based on the commandType variable.
      private boolean executeOrder(java.lang.String parameters)
      Creates an order in the database (tables orders and order_details) and creates a bill as a pdf file if there are enough products for the order or an understocked notice pdf if not.
      private boolean executeReport(Parser.CommandType commandType)
      Creates a report as a pdf of the clients (directly the contents of the table), products (same as clients) or of the orders (this report collects data from all tables, since the orders table contains id references to those tables and order_details contains supplementary information regarding each order).
      void parseCommands()
      Parses all the commands from the text file in Scanner object.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • scanner

        private java.util.Scanner scanner
        Used to read from the text file.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Parser

        public Parser(java.lang.String filename)
        Creates a scanner or stops the execution of the program if the file doesn't exist.
        Parameters:
        filename - the name of the file to be parsed if it's located in the folder project or the path to the file.

    • Method Detail

      • parseCommands

        public void parseCommands()
        Parses all the commands from the text file in Scanner object.

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the scanner.

      • assignCommand

        private Parser.Command assignCommand(java.lang.String commandString,
                                     java.lang.String[] firstElements)
        Private method used by parseCommands method to get the command type.
        Parameters:
        commandString - the whole command as a string.
        firstElements - the elements before ": " of the command.
        Returns:
        the command of type Command enum.

      • assignCommandType

        private Parser.CommandType assignCommandType(java.lang.String[] firstElements,
                                             Parser.Command command,
                                             java.lang.String commandString)
        Private method used by parseCommands method to assign the second command type in case of INSERT, DELETE or REPORT commands.
        Parameters:
        firstElements - the elements before ": " of the command.
        command - the first command type of the command (of type Command).
        commandString - the whole command as a string.
        Returns:
        the second command type of type CommandType.

      • executeCommand

        private boolean executeCommand(Parser.Command command,
                               Parser.CommandType commandType,
                               java.lang.String parameters)
        Executes the command given by the user.
        Parameters:
        command - first command type.
        commandType - second command type.
        parameters - the parameters of the command (leave null if they don't exist).
        Returns:
        true if the command is executes successfully.

      • executeInsert

        private boolean executeInsert(java.lang.String parameters,
                              Parser.CommandType commandType)
        Inserts a client or a product in the database based on the commandType variable.
        Parameters:
        parameters - represents the data to be inserted (the name and the address fields, separated by a comma).
        commandType - where to insert the data (client table or product table).
        Returns:
        true if the command is executes successfully.

      • executeDelete

        private boolean executeDelete(java.lang.String parameters,
                              Parser.CommandType commandType)
        Deletes a client or a product in the database based on the commandType variable.
        Parameters:
        parameters - represents the data to be deleted (the name).
        commandType - from where to delete the data (client table or product table).
        Returns:
        true if the command is executes successfully.

      • executeOrder

        private boolean executeOrder(java.lang.String parameters)
        Creates an order in the database (tables orders and order_details) and creates a bill as a pdf file if there are enough products for the order or an understocked notice pdf if not.
        Parameters:
        parameters - the client making the order, the product to order and the quantity, separated by commas.
        Returns:
        true if the command is executes successfully.

      • executeReport

        private boolean executeReport(Parser.CommandType commandType)
        Creates a report as a pdf of the clients (directly the contents of the table), products (same as clients) or of the orders (this report collects data from all tables, since the orders table contains id references to those tables and order_details contains supplementary information regarding each order).
        Parameters:
        commandType - indicates the type of report.
        Returns:
        true if commandType is valid (CLIENT, PRODUCT or ORDER).
